p: Furthermore, comparing the projection drawings of hexagonal structure and orthorhombic structure of Ti 3Sn from the c axis as shown in Figure 8, the orthorhombic phase drawn in pink could be viewed as a distorted hexagonal phase with the main distortion in the ab plane since a orthorhombic ≈ a hexagonal, b orthorhombic ≈ √3b hexagonal, c orthorhombic ≈ c hexagonal. Thus, the orientation relations between hexagonal parent phase and orthorhombic phase of Ti 3Sn could be suggested as: (110) orthorhombic//(100) hexagonal, <001> orthorhombic//<001> hexagonal.
